title: Local DNS cache configuration
pageDescription: How to configure a local DNS cache on each cluster node to reduce the load on kube-dns and improve the speed and stability of DNS queries processing.
shortDescription: How to configure a local DNS cache on each cluster node to improve the speed and stability of DNS queries processing
markdown: How to configure a local DNS cache on each cluster node to reduce the load on kube-dns and improve the speed and stability of DNS queries processing.
